description_for_human: Create and manipulate 3D scenes with NVIDIA Omniverse and Universal Scene Description (USD).
description_for_model: This plugin allows users to create, modify, and visualize 3D scenes using NVIDIA Omniverse and Pixar's Universal Scene Description (USD) format. You can help users create USD stages, add primitives (spheres, cubes, etc.), create materials, apply physics, generate animations, and visualize scene structures. Use this for 3D content creation, scene manipulation, and USD-based workflows.
example_inputs: Create a new USD stage with a red sphere in the center
Add a blue cube at position (2, 0, 0) to my current stage
Create a metallic material and apply it to the sphere
Show me the hierarchy of my USD scene
Add physics to make the sphere fall onto a ground plane
suggested_tips: You can visualize your scene structure with '/visualize_scene_graph' endpoint with format='html'
For more complex scenes, create a ground plane first, then add objects on top of it
Use stage_id from the 'open_stage' response in subsequent operations
Material paths typically use the pattern '/World/Materials/MyMaterial'
Remember to save your stage after making changes

available_actions.name: Open or create a USD stage
Create a primitive (sphere, cube, cylinder, cone)
